column1: Little Goat Diner////Little goat is one of my favorite places in the city! From their brunch menu to their nachos
column2: I have yet to find something I haven't liked from here. Came here for brunch recently
column3: I got the bulls eye French toast! Toast and chicken
column4: how can I say no to that?! It was delicious! The chicken was crispy and tender
column6: and the egg mixed with toast was in replaceable. Will definitely be coming back for more!
